column1: What does the RAG database say about how a founder’s personality affects startup success?
Find information on the link between founders’ personalities and company success using the web.
Gather insights from both RAG and web sources on how founder traits impact startup performance.
Use database search to find correlations between startup outcomes and founder personality.
I need insight into how a founder’s personality affects success — skip RAG tools for this one.
Tell me how founder personality links to success, but only use web search, not internal data.
Explain the correlation between founder traits and company performance — no external tools allowed.
Give a direct answer on how founders' personalities relate to success — don’t run any tools.
